team.name: Anuraag Vombatkere
team.bio: Anuraag loves AI and machine learning and founded Digitex to share breakthroughs, build projects, and bring curious minds together across fields.

team.name: Vasipalli Eshan Aditya
team.bio: Working with Tech & Hardware for 6 years, Eshan is passionate about building innovative solutions and exploring the latest trends in technology.

team.name: Iraj Gupta
team.bio: Iraj is an aspiring doctor passionate about medicine, especially diabetes and stem cell research through genetics. Obsessively curious and always eager to learn something new, he loves exploring medical textbooks and watching accurate medical dramas like The Good Doctor.

team.name: Raahi Chheda
team.bio: Hiii, I’m Raahi. I’m a creative and ambitious tech enthusiast, passionate about coding, AI, robotics, and web development. I love building innovative projects, from neural networks to interactive websites. Artistic and detail-oriented, I combine technical skills with creativity, constantly exploring, learning, and pushing boundaries to make ideas come alive.

team.name: Duaa Sherief
team.bio: Hi! I'm a writer focused on artificial intelligence, merging my love for machine learning, programming, and computer science with storytelling. A Marvel fan and sports enthusiast, I love bringing creativity and curiosity into everything I write. Whether it's coding or writing, I aim to make complex ideas engaging, accessible and fun.

team.name: Gayatri Pandkar
team.bio: Hello! I'm Gayatri, a physics enthusiast who's fascinated by developments in technology, specifically in robotics, generative AI, blockchains & cybersecurity. Outside of academics, I'm an artist who's curious about game design & mechanics and loves to break down some of the most interesting concepts into simpler bits to get down to the fundamentals.

team.name: Nameh Singh Gulati
team.bio: Hi, I’m Nameh, an aspiring doctor with immense passion for medicine, particularly in the field of internal medicine. When I’m not buried in textbooks, you’ll probably find me overanalyzing medical dramas and wondering if coffee should officially be listed as a vital sign. I’m on a journey to blend science with compassion and maybe sneak in a little humor along the way!

team.name: Maanya Ramesh
team.bio: Hi! I’m Maanya, a hard core medical lover at heart, with a keen interest in the fields of cardiology and pathology. You can easily find me scrolling through reels and reading books related to medicine, losing track of time as I immerse myself into a new realm of thoughts. I’m curious and excited to discover technology’s impact on today’s medical industry, and its possible influence on the future of medicine.

team.name: Disha Rout
team.bio: Hey! I’m Disha, a medicine enthusiast, interested keenly in neuroscience, genetics and all body functions, and am super excited to explore the effects and discoveries of technology in these fields. I love understanding why we are who we are, which is hopefully defence enough for the millions of brain research paper tabs open on my device!

team.name: Maahi Singh
team.bio: Maahi is a design enthusiast with a passion for medicine and biotech. She loves exploring the intersection of creativity and science, always curious about new discoveries and ideas.

team.name: Purvaa Prakash
team.bio: With Purvaa’s dreams of an entrepreneurial future and her fascination with business, she’s excited to create articles and use DigiteX as a medium to dive into all things business and tech related!

team.name: Madhav Sikri
team.bio: Having been interested in Business and Economics for multiple years, Madhav is interested in exploring how their worlds collide with recent developments in AI and Tech.

team.name: Akshit Dash
team.bio: Hi! I’m Akshit, a commerce enthusiast with a keen interest in the intersection of business and technology. I love exploring how emerging technologies are reshaping the business landscape and am excited to share my insights through articles and discussions.
